## Overview

APIs let you access AI models programmatically. MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers extend what AI assistants can do by connecting them to external tools and data sources. This tutorial covers API key management, basic API usage, and setting up MCP servers.

**Prerequisites:** [Claude Code introduction](claude-code-intro.qmd)
**Estimated time:** 35 minutes
